name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shake Up Learning - by Kasey Bell.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Shake Up Learning blog provides teachers with digital learning resources and classroom technology integration ideas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Catch up on the latest posts from Shake Up Learning! This extension give you easy access to the last ten blog posts from www.ShakeUpLearning.com.

The Shake Up Learning website and blog by Kasey Bell provides teachers, educators, and instructional leaders with digital learning resources, tips and tricks, and classroom technology integration ideas. Here you will find fantastic resources for Google apps, including guides and FREE cheat sheets, mobile learning and apps, iPad tips, social media tips, tutorials, and more. www.ShakeUpLearning.com, was recognized as a Must Read EdTech Blog, and an Edublog Awards Finalist for best new blog and best edtech resource blog. Subscribe to the Shake Up Learning email newsletter for the latest posts and exclusive resources and giveaways! www.ShakeUpLearning.com/subscribe
